nodes.text: Khommite striders were elegant four-legged creatures found on the fertile Deep Core planet Khomm.

Khommite striders were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 36. The creatures originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned in the 1998 reference book The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
